title: LFT Gold 5 Mid laner for Open events
body:
I'm looking for any team planning on competing in the upcoming open events.

My champion pool changes very often because I like to keep up with the meta, at the moment the champions I can play with full confidence are:
- Zed
- Ahri
- Fizz
- Talon
- Twisted Fate
- Orianna
and I am currently working on:
- Jayce
- Azir
- Sydra
but if there are any champions you'd like me to learn I'll spam them in normals and then take them into solo queue.

I am currently 16, turning 17 early next year.
As for availability, I will be available almost all of the holidays and pretty much every weekend and after school when school starts again (it will be my final year).

If you want to contact me and play some games my ign is HW Chungis.
